title: 登录服自动关闭
author: 轻言绝路
txt_content:
最近开了一个VPS群组服 但是登录服总是自动关闭 后来加了一个自动重启的脚本 也不好使 貌似加了脚本之后连服都很难打开了，求大神解答！！！！！
WARNING: This build is more than 2 days old and there are likely updates available!
You will get no support with this build unless you update from http://ci.md-t.net/job/Spigot/
The server will start in 10 seconds!
Warning,your max perm gen size is not set or less than 128mb.It is recommended you restart Java with the following argument: -XX:MaxPerSize=128M
Please see http://www.spigotmc.org/wiki/changing-permgen-size/ for more details and more in-depth instructions
Starting minecraft server version 1.7.10
To start the server with more ram, launch it as "java - Xmx1024M - Xms1024M -jar minecraft_server.jar"
Loading properties
Default game type: ADUENTURE
This server is running CraftBukkit cersion git-Spigot-1649 〈MC:1.7.10〉 〈Implementing API version 1.7.10-RO.1-SNAPSHOT〉
Debug logging is disabled
Server Ping Player Sample count:12
Using 4 threads for Netty based IO
Starting Mincraft server on 127.0.0.1:234
****FAILED TO BIND TO PORT!
The exception was :java.net.BindException: Address already in use: bind
Perhaps a server is already running on that port?
Stopping server
Saving players
Stopping server
Saving players

纯手打 有的地方有可能出错，
插件有AuthMe、BungeeTabListPlus、BungeeTabListPlus-BukkitBridge、ChestCommands、ColorMOTD、DeathMessages、Essentials、FancyTab、GroupManager、HolographicDisplays、Info-Board、PluginMetrics、PrefixManager、ProtocolLib、PTweaks、Residence、ScriptBlock、Stp、update、Updater、Vault、WorldEdit、Yamler-Bungee-2.2.3-SNAPSHOT.jar

replies.txt_content: 端口占用了吧……你把登录服端口改一下试试

replies.author: 轻言绝路
replies.txt_content:
807765502 发表于 2016-2-29 19:52
端口占用了吧……你把登录服端口改一下试试
怎么改。。我技术去考试了。
打开server.properties 找到234这个数字 改成别的就行

replies.author: 轻言绝路
replies.txt_content:
807765502 发表于 2016-2-29 20:36
**** 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽 ****
。、不是这个原因 我昨天发现是因为内存不够了 能问一下怎么删除子服吗？
